item.title: Lecture 11 : Computer of the 21st Century
item.description: Are we already living in a world of ubiquitous computing ? If we follow Mark Wesiser’s point of view that I’ll describe below, we are not yet in a world of ubiquitous computing but I do believe that we are getting pretty close to it. The IoT and the always expanding capabilities of our devices has brought us closer to such a world. I believe that we have all the pieces (nearly) to build such a world but this is not our priority right now and I guess our generation is not ready for it.
